links.name: Ares S-III Super Squirt
links.description: Acc3 Chemical SA. Contact vector toxin. Light Pistol ranges.

links.name: Fichetti Pain inducer
links.description: ACC3 SS. Toxin Power 8, immediate. Resists with Body + Willpower. If mod power > target mental limit spend next action phase to run away. Can hold with complex action until dodged. Otherwise pain. Wireless charges in 1 hour.

links.name: Parashield Dart Pistol
links.description: ACC5 SA Darts with toxin. Wireless reports success.

links.name: Parashield Dart Rifle
links.description: ACC6 SA Darts with toxin. Wireless reports success.

links.name: Ares screech sonic rifle
links.description: Acc6 7S SS. Resisted wit willpower and damper wear. Nausea and disorientation.
